about.title: A Little About Minal
content: Welcome to my creative corner! I specialize in turning yarn into flowers that never fade and accessories that hug you with warmth. Every stitch is made with patience and passion.
Whether you need a bouquet for a loved one or a cute coaster set for your desk, everything is 100% handmade and customizable to your color palette.

customOrder.title: Request a Custom Order
customOrder.description: Have a specific design in mind? Describe it below! When you click "Send Request", I'll copy your message and open my Instagram so you can DM me directly.
customOrder.placeholder: Hi Minal! I would like to order a bouquet of 3 lavender tulips and 2 white daisies...
